title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading, building and running LLMs locally with a simple API and ready-to-run quantized models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, browsers and edge runtimes.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); offers chat history, RAG, user roles, dark mode and plug-in system.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous, asynchronous and reactive APIs for chat, generate and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects and blocks.

title: ollama-cli (rust) – rsaryev/ollama-cli
summary: Fast TUI client written in Rust that supports syntax-highlighted streaming, conversation history and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot – github-copilot-like plugin for VS Code
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions, explain-code and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server and webUI containers.

title: llamafile → ollama importer
summary: Tool to convert Mozilla llamafile binaries into Ollama Modelfiles so you can serve them through Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector, PVC and ingress support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot – end-to-end example
summary: Complete RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs and Markdown.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Official Node-API native addon for high-performance tokenization and inference bindings inside Node.js.
